bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: IRQ
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In IRQ mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: FIQ
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In FIQ mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: UND
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In UND mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: ABT
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In ABT mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: SVC
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In SVC mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: USR
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In USR mode

register_group.name: MON
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In MON mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

register_group.name: HYP
register_group.description: Banked Core Registers In HYP mode

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Carry or Borrow or Extend flag

bitField.name: GE
bitField.description: Greater than or Equal flags, for SIMD instructions

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number of the processor: this is the major revision number n in the rn part of the rnpn description of the product revision status

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the minor revision number of the processor: this is the minor revision number n in the pn part of the rnpn description of the product revision status

bitField.name: DMinLine
bitField.description: Log2 of the number of words in the smallest cache line of all the data and unified caches under the core control

bitField.name: L1IP
bitField.description: Indicates the level 1 instruction cache policy for indexing and tagging

bitField.name: IminLine
bitField.description: Log2 of the number of words in the smallest cache line of all the instruction caches under the control of the processor

bitField.name: NU
bitField.description: Not Unified: indicates whether the implementation has a unified TLB

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: U bit: 1 = Processor is always part of a uniprocessor system

bitField.name: MT
bitField.description: Indicates whether the lowest level of affinity consists of logical processors that are implemented using a multi-threading type approach

bitField.name: CID
bitField.description: Indicates the value read in the CLUSTERID configuration pin: it identifies a Cortex-A15 processor in a system with more than one Cortex-A15 processor present

bitField.name: CPUID
bitField.description: Indicates the processor number in the Cortex-A15 processor

bitField.name: S3
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb Execution Environment (ThumbEE) instruction set

bitField.name: S1
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb instruction set

bitField.name: S0
bitField.description: Indicates support for ARM instruction set

bitField.name: CM_SETWAY
bitField.description: Cache maintenance by set and way

bitField.name: LoUU
bitField.description: Indicates the Level of Unification Uniprocessor for the cache hierarchy

bitField.name: LoUIS
bitField.description: Indicates the Level of Unification Inner Shareable for the cache hierarchy

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: Banked; This is the Access Flag Enable bit.

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: Banked; This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Exception Endianness bit, the value of this bit defines the value of the CPSR.E bit on entry to an exception vector

bitField.name: UWXN
bitField.description: Banked; Determines force Execute Never (XN) for memory regions with unprivileged write permissions from PL1.

bitField.name: WXN
bitField.description: Banked; Determines force Execute Never (XN) for memory regions with write permissions.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Enables program flow prediction: 0 = program flow prediction disabled, reset value 1 = program flow prediction enabled.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: An ASID for the translation table base address. The TTBCR.A1 field selects either TTBR0.ASID or TTBR1.ASID.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[39:x] where x is determined by TTBCR.T0SZ. Currently defined as [39:0] and includes the zero bits at the start. View as hexadecimal as the decimal values will be wrong.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: An ASID for the translation table base address. The TTBCR.A1 field selects either TTBR0.ASID or TTBR1.ASID.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[39:x] where x is determined by TTBCR.T1SZ. Currently defined as [39:0] and includes the zero bits at the start. View as hexadecimal as the decimal values will be wrong.

bitField.name: INDEX
bitField.description: L1 ECC Double-Bit Error Index Address

bitField.name: INDEX
bitField.description: L1 ECC Double-Bit Error Index Address

bitField.name: INDEX
bitField.description: L1 ECC Double-Bit Error Index Address

bitField.name: D32DIS
bitField.description: Disable use of registers D16-D31 of the VFP register file

bitField.name: FVCA
bitField.description: Force NEON and VFP clock active

bitField.name: FIRSW
bitField.description: Force in-order requests to the same set and way

bitField.name: DL2IPA
bitField.description: Disable L2 TBW IPA PA cache

bitField.name: DL2S1W
bitField.description: Disable L2 TBW stage 1 walk cache

bitField.name: DL2S1L2
bitField.description: Disable L2 TBW stage 1 L2 PA cache

bitField.name: SODLR
bitField.description: Enable full Strongly-ordered and Device load replay

bitField.name: FIBE
bitField.description: Force in-order issue in branch execution unit

bitField.name: FIGL
bitField.description: Force instruction group limit to one

bitField.name: FAW
bitField.description: Flush after CP14 and CP15 writes

bitField.name: FP
bitField.description: Force push of CP14 CP15 registers

bitField.name: FS
bitField.description: Force serialization after each instruction group

bitField.name: SMP
bitField.description: Enables the processor to receive instruction cache, BTB, and TLB maintenance operations from other processors

bitField.name: EPLDAN
bitField.description: Execute PLD instructions as a NOP

bitField.name: LLBD
bitField.description: Limit to one loop buffer detect per flush

bitField.name: EDCC
bitField.description: Execute data cache clean as data cache clean and invalidate

register.name: ICIALLUIS
register.description: Instruction cache invalidate All to PoU Inner Shareable

register.name: BPIALLIS
register.description: Branch predictor invalidate all Inner Shareable

register.name: ICIALLU
register.description: Instruction Cache Invalidate All to PoU

register.name: ICIMVAU
register.description: Instruction cache invalidate by MVA to PoU

register.name: DCIMVAC
register.description: Data cache invalidate by MVA to PoC

register.name: DCISW
register.description: Data cache invalidate by set and way

register.name: DCCMVAC
register.description: Data cache clean by MVA to PoC

register.name: DCCSW
register.description: Data cache clean by set and way

register.name: DCCMVAU
register.description: Data cache clean by MVA to PoU

register.name: DCCIMVAC
register.description: Data cache clean and invalidate by MVA to PoC

register.name: DCCISW
register.description: Data cache clean and invalidate by set and way

register.name: ITLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate instruction TLB entry by MVA

register.name: ITLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate instruction TLB by ASID match

register.name: DTLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate data TLB entry by MVA

register.name: DTLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate data TLB by ASID match

register.name: TLBIMVA
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB entry by MVA

register.name: TLBIASID
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB by ASID match

register.name: TLBIALLIS
register.description: Invalidate entire Unified TLB Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIMVAIS
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB entry by MVA Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIASIDIS
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB entry by ASID match Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIMVAAIS
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB entry by MVA all ASID Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIMVAA
register.description: Invalidate unified TLB by MVA all ASID

register.name: TLBIALLHIS
register.description: Invalidate entire Hyp unified TLB Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIMVAHIS
register.description: Invalidate Hyp unified TLB entry by MVA Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIALLNSNHIS
register.description: Invalidate entire Non-secure Non-Hyp unified TLB Inner Shareable

register.name: TLBIMVAH
register.description: Invalidate Hyp unified TLB entry by MVA

register.name: TLBIALLNSNH
register.description: Invalidate entire Non-secure Non-Hyp unified TLB

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates if the result is a supersection

bitField.name: FS
bitField.description: Holds the fault status bits for the aborted address

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table

bitField.name: FSTAGE
bitField.description: Indicates the translation stage at which the translation aborted

bitField.name: S2WLK
bitField.description: This bit is set to indicate that the translation aborted because of a stage 2 fault during a stage 1 translation table walk

bitField.name: FS
bitField.description: Holds the fault status bits for the aborted address

register.name: ATS1CPR
register.description: Priv Read VA to PA translation (current security state)

register.name: ATS1CPW
register.description: Priv Write VA to PA translation (current security state)

register.name: ATS1CUR
register.description: User Read VA to PA translation (current security state)

register.name: ATS1CUW
register.description: User Write VA to PA translation (current security state)

register.name: ATS12NSOPR
register.description: Priv Read VA to PA translation (other security state)

register.name: ATS12NSOPW
register.description: Priv Write VA to PA translation (other security state)

register.name: ATS12NSOUR
register.description: User Read VA to PA translation (other security state)

register.name: ATS12NSOUW
register.description: User Write VA to PA translation (other security state)

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the number of counters implemented.

bitField.name: _DP
bitField.description: Disables cycle counter, CCNT, when non-invasive debug is prohibited.

bitField.name: X
bitField.description: Enables export of the events from the event bus to an external monitoring block, such as the ETM to trace events.

bitField.name: D
bitField.description: Clock divider: 0 = counts every processor clock cycle.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Clock counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets counter, CCNT, to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Event counter reset: 0 = no action 1 = resets all event counters to zero. This bit Read-As-Zero.

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Enable bit: 0 = disables all counters, including CCNT 1 = enables all counters including CCNT.

bitField.name: IAE_CC_WTTB
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, write to translation table base

bitField.name: MONPBSE
bitField.description: Mispredicted or not predicted branch speculatively executed

bitField.name: IAE_CC_ULOS
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, unaligned load or store

bitField.name: IAE_CC_R
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, procedure return

bitField.name: IAE_CC_IB
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, immediate branch

bitField.name: IAE_CC_SCOTPC
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, software change of the PC

bitField.name: IAE_CC_WTCONTEXTIDR
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, write to CONTEXTIDR

bitField.name: IAE_CC_S
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, store

bitField.name: IAE_CC_L
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, load

bitField.name: IAE_CC_SWI
bitField.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, software increment

bitField.name: PMUSERENR_EN
bitField.description: User mode access to performance counters

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: PMCCNTR overflow interrupt request enable bit

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: PMCCNTR overflow interrupt request disable bit.

bitField.name: NS_SMP
bitField.description: SMP bit of the Auxiliary Control Register is writable in Non-secure state

bitField.name: NS_L2ERR
bitField.description: L2 error bits of the L2 Extended Control Register writable in Non-secure state

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Exception Endianness bit, the value of this bit defines the value of the CPSR.E bit on entry to an exception vector in Hyp mode

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Alignment bit. This is the enable bit for Alignment fault checking, for memory accesses made in Hyp mode

bitField.name: TPU
bitField.description: Trap cache maintenance to point of unification operations

bitField.name: TPC
bitField.description: Trap cache maintenance to point of coherency operations

bitField.name: TIDCP
bitField.description: Trap lockdown. When this bit is set to 1, any valid Non-secure access to a CP15 lockdown, DMA, or TCM operation, is trapped to Hyp mode

bitField.name: FB
bitField.description: Force broadcast of TLB maintenance and other operations

bitField.name: AMO
bitField.description: Overrides the CPSR.A bit, and enables signaling by the VA bit

bitField.name: IMO
bitField.description: Overrides the CPSR.I bit, and enables signaling by the VI bit

bitField.name: FMO
bitField.description: Overrides the CPSR.F bit, and enables signaling by the VF bit

bitField.name: VM
bitField.description: Virtualization MMU enable bit. This is a global enable bit for the PL1 and 0 stage 2 MMU

bitField.name: TDOSA
bitField.description: Trap Debug OS related register Access

bitField.name: TPMCR
bitField.description: Trap Performance Monitor Control Register accesses

bitField.name: HPMN
bitField.description: Defines the number of Performance Monitors counters that are accessible from Non-secure PL1 modes, and from Non-secure PL0 modes if unprivileged access is enabled

bitField.name: TCPAC
bitField.description: Trap Coprocessor Access Control Register accesses

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using HTTBR

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using HTTBR

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using HTTBR

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by HTTBR

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using VTTBR

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using VTTBR

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using VTTBR

bitField.name: SL0
bitField.description: Starting level for translation table walks using VTTBR

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by VTTBR

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[39:x]. The HTCR.T0SZ field determines the width of the defined translation table base address. Currently defined as [39:0] and includes the zero bits at the start. View as hexadecimal as the decimal values will be wrong.

bitField.name: VMID
bitField.description: The VMID for the translation table.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, bits[39:x]. X is determined by the VTCR.T0SZ and VTCR.SL0 fields. Currently defined as [39:0] and includes the zero bits at the start. View as hexadecimal as the decimal values will be wrong.

bitField.name: INDEX
bitField.description: L1 ECC Double-Bit Error Index Address

bitField.name: PL0PTEN
bitField.description: Controls whether the physical timer registers are accessible from PL0 modes

bitField.name: PL0VTEN
bitField.description: Controls whether the virtual timer registers are accessible from PL0

bitField.name: EVNTI
bitField.description: which bit of CNTVCT is the trigger for the event stream generated from the virtual counter, when that stream is enabled

bitField.name: EVNTDIR
bitField.description: Controls which transition of the CNTVCT trigger bit, defined by EVNTI, generates an event, when the event stream is enabled

bitField.name: EVNTEN
bitField.description: Enables the generation of an event stream from the virtual counter

bitField.name: PL0VCTEN
bitField.description: Controls whether the virtual counter, CNTVCT, and the frequency register CNTFRQ, are accessible from PL0 modes

bitField.name: PL0PCTEN
bitField.description: Controls whether the physical counter, CNTPCT, and the frequency register CNTFRQ, are accessible from PL0 modes

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer interrupt

register.name: CNTP_CVAL
register.description: Counter PL1 Physical Compare Value Register

register.name: CNTV_CVAL
register.description: Counter PL1 Virtual Compare Value Register

bitField.name: EVNTI
bitField.description: Selects which bit of CNTPCT is the trigger for the event stream generated from the physical counter, when that stream is enabled

bitField.name: EVNTDIR
bitField.description: Controls which transition of the CNTPCT trigger bit, defined by EVNTI, generates an event, when the event stream is enabled

bitField.name: EVNTEN
bitField.description: Enables the generation of an event stream from the physical counter

bitField.name: PL1PCEN
bitField.description: Controls whether the Non-secure copies of the physical timer registers are accessible from Non-secure PL1 and PL0 modes

bitField.name: PL1PCTEN
bitField.description: Controls whether the physical counter, CNTPCT, is accessible from Non-secure PL1 and PL0 modes

register.name: CNTHP_TVAL
register.description: Counter Non-secure PL2 Physical Timer Value Register

bitField.name: ISTATUS
bitField.description: The status of the timer interrupt

register.name: CNTHP_CVAL
register.description: Counter Non-secure PL2 Physical Compare Value Register

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: Banked; This is the Access Flag Enable bit.

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: Banked; This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Banked; Determines how the E bit in the CPSR is set on an exception.

bitField.name: UWXN
bitField.description: Banked; Determines force Execute Never (XN) for memory regions with unprivileged write permissions from PL1.

bitField.name: WXN
bitField.description: Banked; Determines force Execute Never (XN) for memory regions with write permissions.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Enables program flow prediction: 0 = program flow prediction disabled, reset value 1 = program flow prediction enabled.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses.

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates if the result is a supersection

bitField.name: FS
bitField.description: Holds the fault status bits for the aborted address

bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table

bitField.name: FSTAGE
bitField.description: Indicates the translation stage at which the translation aborted

bitField.name: S2WLK
bitField.description: This bit is set to indicate that the translation aborted because of a stage 2 fault during a stage 1 translation table walk

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates if the result is a supersection

bitField.name: FS
bitField.description: Holds the fault status bits for the aborted address

register.name: N_CNTP_CVAL
register.description: [N] PL1 Physical Timer Compare Value Register

bitField.description: Banked; This is the Access Flag Enable bit.

bitField.description: Banked; This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU.

bitField.description: Banked; Determines how the E bit in the CPSR is set on an exception.

bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Determines if instructions can be cached in any instruction cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Enables program flow prediction: 0 = program flow prediction disabled, reset value 1 = program flow prediction enabled.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Determines if data can be cached in a data or unified cache at any cache level.

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses.

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Contains the physical address after a successful translation

bitField.name: NS
bitField.description: Indicates the state of the NS attribute bit in the translation table

bitField.name: FSTAGE
bitField.description: Indicates the translation stage at which the translation aborted

bitField.name: S2WLK
bitField.description: This bit is set to indicate that the translation aborted because of a stage 2 fault during a stage 1 translation table walk

bitField.name: INNER
bitField.description: Indicates the inner attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: OUTER
bitField.description: Indicates the outer attributes from the translation table

bitField.name: Supersection
bitField.description: Indicates if the result is a supersection

bitField.name: FS
bitField.description: Holds the fault status bits for the aborted address

register.name: S_CNTP_CVAL
register.description: [S] PL1 Physical Timer Compare Value Register

bitField.name: WAY
bitField.description: Indicates the way of the RAM that is being accessed

bitField.name: INDEX
bitField.description: Indicates the index address of the RAM that is being accessed

bitField.name: BW
bitField.description: The bank or way of the RAM where the first memory error occurred

bitField.name: ECCE
bitField.description: ECC and parity enable bit in L1 and L2 caches

bitField.name: EL2GT
bitField.description: Enable L2, GIC, and Timer regional clock gates

bitField.name: ERTATB
bitField.description: Enables replay threshold single issue for all tag banks

bitField.name: ERTCTB
bitField.description: Enables replay threshold single issue for current tag bank

bitField.name: DMOWWE
bitField.description: Disables multiple outstanding WriteClean/WriteBack/Evicts using the same AWID

bitField.name: DDSB
bitField.description: Disables DSB with no DVM synchronization

bitField.name: FL1
bitField.description: Force limit to one request per tag bank

bitField.name: DDT
bitField.description: Disable dynamic throttling of load/store prefetch requests

bitField.name: EPR
bitField.description: Enable prefetch requests from ReadUnique transactions

bitField.name: DAP
bitField.description: Disable table walk descriptor access prefetch

tcf:enumeration.name: SCTLR_V
tcf:enumeration.values: Normal Vectors base address=0,High Vectors base address=1

bitField.name: SW
bitField.description: VFP Implementation. Shows whether FP is implemented in Hardware and Software

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Shows the VFP Coprocessor architecture version

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces a less than result

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal result

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal, greater than, or unordered result

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an unordered result

bitField.name: Stride
bitField.description: The vector stride is the increment value used to select the registers involved in the next iteration of the short vector instruction

bitField.name: LEN
bitField.description: Controls the vector length for VFP instructions that operate on short vectors. The vector length is the number of iterations in a short vector instruction.

bitField.name: DZE
bitField.description: Division by Zero exception enable bit

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: A global enable for the Advanced SIMD and Floating-point Extensions. Setting the EN bit to 1 enables the Advanced SIMD and VFP Extension.

bitField.name: HW_square_root_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware square root

bitField.name: Double_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for double precision VFP

bitField.name: Single_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for single precision VFP.

bitField.name: Media_reg_bank_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for the media register bank.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_FMAC
bitField.description: Indicates whether any implemented Floating-point or Advanced SIMD Extension implements the fused multiply accumulate instructions

bitField.name: FVP_HPFP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Floating-point Extension implements half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_HPFP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements half-precision floating-point conversion instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_SPFP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements single-precision floating-point instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_I
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements integer instructions.

bitField.name: A_SIMD_LS
bitField.description: Indicates whether the Advanced SIMD Extension implements load/store instructions

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Full denormal arithmetic supported for VFP

register.name: GICV_HPPIR
register.description: VM Highest Priority Pending Interrupt Register

register.name: GICV_AEOIR
register.description: VM Aliased End of Interrupt Register

register.name: GICV_AHPPIR
register.description: VM Aliased Highest Priority Pending Interrupt Register
